statements: UPDATE visitor_footfall SET duration_minutes = 30, is_new_visitor = false WHERE site_id = 100 AND visitor_id = 500 AND visit_date = '2022-10-01' AND visit_time = '15:30:00';
UPDATE visitor_footfall SET location = 'Lobby', duration_minutes = 45 WHERE visitor_id = 200 AND site_id = 300 AND visit_date = '2022-10-02' AND visit_time = '09:45:00';
UPDATE visitor_footfall SET duration_minutes = 30, is_new_visitor = TRUE WHERE site_id = 101 AND visitor_id = 2001 AND visit_date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE visitor_footfall SET location = 'Hall A', visit_time = '14:30:00' WHERE visitor_id = 3003 AND site_id = 202 AND visit_date = '2022-09-20';
UPDATE tourist_sites SET city='Paris' WHERE site_id='abc123';
UPDATE visitor_footfall SET site_id='xyz789', visit_timestamp='2022-06-30 15:30:00' WHERE visitor_id='123abc';
UPDATE visitor_footfall SET visit_timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE visitor_id = 'a56c38b0-454d-4d5a-b492-876a3acf7293';
UPDATE tourist_sites SET site_name = 'New Site Name', city = 'Updated City' WHERE site_id = '26a0dc26-e6e9-4621-869b-0b40302c7606';
UPDATE visitor_sites SET site_name='New Site Name' WHERE site_id=1;
UPDATE visitor_analytics SET peak_hours='10AM-2PM, 6PM-8PM' WHERE site_id=3 AND total_visitors >= 100;
UPDATE visitor_sites SET visitors_count = visitors_count + 1 WHERE site_id = 1;
UPDATE visitor_analytics SET total_visitors = 500, peak_hours = '10AM-12PM' WHERE site_id = 2;
UPDATE visitor_sites SET location = 'New York' WHERE site_id = 1;
UPDATE visitor_demographics SET gender = 'Female', age = 30 WHERE visitor_id = 5;

UPDATE visitor_logs SET entry_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE log_id = 123;
UPDATE VisitorProfiles SET visitor_age = 30 WHERE visitor_id = 1;
UPDATE SiteFootfall SET footfall_count = 1000, footfall_date = '2022-05-01' WHERE site_id = 3;
UPDATE VisitorRecords SET visit_duration = '2 hours 30 minutes' WHERE visitor_id = 101 AND site_id = 201
UPDATE SiteFootfall SET footfall_count = 500, footfall_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE site_id = 301 AND record_id = 401
